name: hazid-generator
description: CERN CMS Safety Hazard Identification Generator
author: Win Thawdar Aung @ CMS Safety Team Summer Student 2025

scripts.build-python: cd public && python -m PyInstaller generate_docx.py --onefile --noconsole --distpath ../dist && cd ..
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.package-win: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-packager . "HazID Generator" --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=app --overwrite --icon="src/assets/Logo CMS Safety.ico"
scripts.package-mac: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-packager . "HazID Generator" --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out=app --overwrite --icon="src/assets/Logo CMS Safety.icns"
scripts.package-linux: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-packager . "HazID Generator" --platform=linux --arch=x64 --out=app --overwrite --icon="src/assets/Logo CMS Safety.png"
scripts.package-all: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-packager . "HazID Generator" --all --out=app --overwrite --icon="src/assets/Logo CMS Safety.png"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run electron-dev-simple
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build-python
scripts.rebuild-win: npm run clean && npm run package-win
scripts.rebuild-mac: npm run clean && npm run package-mac
scripts.rebuild-linux: npm run clean && npm run package-linux
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-builder
scripts.dist-win: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-builder --win
scripts.dist-msi: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-builder --win nsis
scripts.dist-all: npm run build && npm run build-python && npx electron-builder --win --mac --linux
